channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Ethan Jackwitz

item.title: State Restoration for Settings Changes
item.description: State Restoration with Custom Transition Modals When requesting permissions and the user has in the past declined your application, the best thing you can do is open to your apps settings page. However if the user changes any of the permissions your app is granted the system will kill your app. This is a smart way to help ensure permissions are more easily enforced. The issue comes when a user would expect to be able to toggle the permission on and go straight back to where they were.
